languages.text: Falling unconscious (except for familiars) or gaining fresh wounds in the {g|f:215d9f42b7e6435e9ed77337156e0fc3}extrapolation{/g} area doesn't lower the retinue's Momentum anymore and gives other retinue members {uip|DeathMomentum|7118f19ea17a4fa9bf849fe70766fbbb} Momentum instead.

traits.locale_text: Falling unconscious (except for familiars) or gaining fresh wounds in the {g|f:215d9f42b7e6435e9ed77337156e0fc3}extrapolation{/g} area doesn't lower the retinue's Momentum anymore and gives other retinue members {uip|DeathMomentum|7118f19ea17a4fa9bf849fe70766fbbb} Momentum instead.

languages.text: When an allied character falls unconscious or suffers a {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}fresh injury{/g} in a 4-cell radius around the servo-skull swarm, the {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} of the party is not reduced. Instead, it is increased by +{uip|DeathMomentum|7118f19ea17a4fa9bf849fe70766fbbb} for each allied character still in combat.

traits.locale_text: When an allied character falls unconscious or suffers {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}fresh injury{/g} in a 4-cell radius around the servo-skull swarm, the {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} of the party is not reduced. Instead, it is increased by +{uip|DeathMomentum|7118f19ea17a4fa9bf849fe70766fbbb} for each allied character still in combat.

When an allied character falls unconscious or suffers a {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}fresh injury{/g} in a 4-cell radius around the servo-skull swarm, the {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} of the party is not reduced. Instead, it is increased by +{uip|DeathMomentum|7118f19ea17a4fa9bf849fe70766fbbb} for each allied character still in combat.

When an allied character falls unconscious or suffers a {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}fresh injury{/g} in a 4-cell radius around the servo-skull swarm, the {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} of the party is not reduced. Instead, it is increased by +{uip|DeathMomentum|7118f19ea17a4fa9bf849fe70766fbbb} for each allied character still in combat.

languages.text: Когда союзный персонаж падает без сознания или получает {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}свежее ранение{/g} в радиусе 4 клеток от роя сервочерепов, {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}моментум{/g} отряда не снижается — наоборот, он увеличивается на {uip|DeathMomentum|7118f19ea17a4fa9bf849fe70766fbbb} за каждого дружественного персонажа в строю.
languages.original_text: When an allied character falls unconscious or suffers {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}fresh injury{/g} in a 4-cell radius around the servo-skull swarm, the {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} of the party is not reduced. Instead, it is increased by +{uip|DeathMomentum|7118f19ea17a4fa9bf849fe70766fbbb} for each allied character still in combat.

traits.locale_text: Когда союзный персонаж падает без сознания или получает {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}свежее ранение{/g} в радиусе 4 клеток от роя сервочерепов, {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}моментум{/g} отряда не снижается — наоборот, он увеличивается на {uip|DeathMomentum|7118f19ea17a4fa9bf849fe70766fbbb} за каждого персонажа в бою.

Когда союзный персонаж падает без сознания или получает {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}свежее ранение{/g} в радиусе 4 клеток от роя сервочерепов, {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}моментум{/g} отряда не снижается — наоборот, он увеличивается на {uip|DeathMomentum|7118f19ea17a4fa9bf849fe70766fbbb} за каждого персонажа в бою.

Когда союзный персонаж падает без сознания или получает {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}свежее ранение{/g} в радиусе 4 клеток от роя сервочерепов, {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}моментум{/g} отряда не снижается — наоборот, он увеличивается на {uip|DeathMomentum|7118f19ea17a4fa9bf849fe70766fbbb} за каждого дружественного персонажа в строю.

languages.text: サーヴォスカル・スウォームの周囲4セル以内に味方が戦闘不能になるか、{g|Encyclopedia:Injury}生傷{/g}を受けた場合、パーティの {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}推進力{/g}は減少しない。代わりに、戦闘中の味方人ごとに +{uip|DeathMomentum|7118f19ea17a4fa9bf849fe70766fbbb}増加する。
languages.original_text: When an allied character falls unconscious or suffers a {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}fresh injury{/g} in a 4-cell radius around the servo-skull swarm, the {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} of the party is not reduced. Instead, it is increased by +{uip|DeathMomentum|7118f19ea17a4fa9bf849fe70766fbbb} for each allied character still in combat.

traits.locale_text: サーヴォスカル・スウォームの周囲4セル以内に味方が戦闘不能になるか、{g|Encyclopedia:Injury}生傷{/g}を受けた場合、パーティの {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}推進力{/g}は減少しない。代わりに、戦闘中の味方人ごとに +{uip|DeathMomentum|7118f19ea17a4fa9bf849fe70766fbbb}増加する。

languages.text: Lorsqu'un personnage allié perd connaissance ou souffre d'une {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}lésion récente{/g} dans un rayon de 4 cases autour de l'essaim de servocrânes, la {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}Fougue{/g} du groupe ne s'en trouve pas réduite pour autant. Elle augmente au contraire de +{uip|DeathMomentum|7118f19ea17a4fa9bf849fe70766fbbb} pour chaque personnage allié encore au combat.
languages.original_text: When an allied character falls unconscious or suffers a {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}fresh injury{/g} in a 4-cell radius around the servo-skull swarm, the {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} of the party is not reduced. Instead, it is increased by +{uip|DeathMomentum|7118f19ea17a4fa9bf849fe70766fbbb} for each allied character still in combat.

traits.locale_text: Lorsqu'un personnage allié perd connaissance ou souffre d'une {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}lésion récente{/g} dans un rayon de 4 cases autour de l'essaim de servocrânes, la {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}Fougue{/g} du groupe ne s'en trouve pas réduite pour autant. Elle augmente au contraire de +{uip|DeathMomentum|7118f19ea17a4fa9bf849fe70766fbbb} pour chaque personnage allié encore au combat.

languages.text: Cuando un personaje aliado cae inconsciente o sufre una {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}lesión reciente{/g} en un radio de 4 casillas en torno al enjambre de servocráneos, no se reduce el {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}ímpetu{/g} del grupo. En vez de eso, aumenta en +{uip|DeathMomentum|7118f19ea17a4fa9bf849fe70766fbbb} por cada personaje aliado que sigue luchando.
languages.original_text: When an allied character falls unconscious or suffers a {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}fresh injury{/g} in a 4-cell radius around the servo-skull swarm, the {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} of the party is not reduced. Instead, it is increased by +{uip|DeathMomentum|7118f19ea17a4fa9bf849fe70766fbbb} for each allied character still in combat.

traits.locale_text: Cuando un personaje aliado cae inconsciente o sufre una {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}lesión reciente{/g} en un radio de 4 casillas en torno al enjambre de servocráneos, no se reduce el {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}ímpetu{/g} del grupo. En vez de eso, aumenta en +{uip|DeathMomentum|7118f19ea17a4fa9bf849fe70766fbbb} por cada personaje aliado que sigue luchando.

languages.text: 当距离伺服头骨集群4格内的盟友陷入昏迷或承受{g|Encyclopedia:Injury}新伤{/g}时，队伍的{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}士气{/g}不会降低。相反，每有一位仍然处于战斗状态的盟友，士气就会提高{uip|DeathMomentum|7118f19ea17a4fa9bf849fe70766fbbb}点。
languages.original_text: When an allied character falls unconscious or suffers a {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}fresh injury{/g} in a 4-cell radius around the servo-skull swarm, the {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} of the party is not reduced. Instead, it is increased by +{uip|DeathMomentum|7118f19ea17a4fa9bf849fe70766fbbb} for each allied character still in combat.

traits.locale_text: 当距离伺服头骨集群4格内的盟友陷入昏迷或承受{g|Encyclopedia:Injury}新伤{/g}时，队伍的{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}士气{/g}不会降低。相反，每有一位仍然处于战斗状态的盟友，士气就会提高{uip|DeathMomentum|7118f19ea17a4fa9bf849fe70766fbbb}点。

languages.text: Wenn ein verbündeter Charakter in einem Radius von 4 Feldern um den Servoschädel-Schwarm bewusstlos wird oder eine {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}frische Verletzung{/g} erleidet, wird die {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}Dynamik{/g} der Gruppe nicht reduziert. Stattdessen wird sie für alle noch aktiven Verbündeten um +{uip|DeathMomentum|7118f19ea17a4fa9bf849fe70766fbbb} erhöht.
languages.original_text: When an allied character falls unconscious or suffers a {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}fresh injury{/g} in a 4-cell radius around the servo-skull swarm, the {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} of the party is not reduced. Instead, it is increased by +{uip|DeathMomentum|7118f19ea17a4fa9bf849fe70766fbbb} for each allied character still in combat.

traits.locale_text: Wenn ein verbündeter Charakter in einem Radius von 4 Feldern um den Servoschädel-Schwarm bewusstlos wird oder eine {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}frische Verletzung{/g} erleidet, wird die {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}Dynamik{/g} der Gruppe nicht reduziert. Stattdessen wird sie für alle noch aktiven Verbündeten um +{uip|DeathMomentum|7118f19ea17a4fa9bf849fe70766fbbb} erhöht.

languages.text: Dost bir karakter, hizmelet sürüsünün etrafındaki 4 hücrelik yarıçap içinde baygın düştüğünde veya {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}taze sakatlığa{/g} maruz kaldığında grubun {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} değeri azalmaz. Aksine, hâlâ çatışmada bulunan her dost karakter için +{uip|DeathMomentum|7118f19ea17a4fa9bf849fe70766fbbb} artar.
languages.original_text: When an allied character falls unconscious or suffers a {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}fresh injury{/g} in a 4-cell radius around the servo-skull swarm, the {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} of the party is not reduced. Instead, it is increased by +{uip|DeathMomentum|7118f19ea17a4fa9bf849fe70766fbbb} for each allied character still in combat.

traits.locale_text: Dost bir karakter, hizmelet sürüsünün etrafındaki 4 hücrelik yarıçap içinde baygın düştüğünde veya {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}taze sakatlığa{/g} maruz kaldığında grubun {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} değeri azalmaz. Aksine, hâlâ çatışmada bulunan her dost karakter için +{uip|DeathMomentum|7118f19ea17a4fa9bf849fe70766fbbb} artar.
